name: The tornado of dandelion seeds.
description:
:

The tornado of dandelion seeds, is  a  2D visual novel, where you get to play as a dandelion, whom has a long way to make to the top of the mountain to meet,  the "Queen of Winds" whom is also known as "Szélanya" the Hungarian goddess of wind. 

If you want to know more about the journey of the dandelions, try out the game!

Showscase video: 

Features:

  • 2D.
  • Interactive narrative game using Unity + Fungus.

Postmortem:

If you want to read more: https://elizaszilagyi.medium.com/postmortem-the-tornado-of-dandelion-seeds-4fddd...
